tool_description: Scans and retrieves real-time financial news and sec filings from  30 different news sources.
title: Financial News Streamer

api_list.name: Financial News Stream Get
api_list.description: API Get to retrieve financial news from 30 different sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-news-streamer.p.rapidapi.com/fnastreamer.azurewebsites.net/api/home"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-news-streamer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
